content.query:
DROP TABLE [dbo].[kompa]

CREATE TABLE dbo.kompa(
    BatchCode varchar(4000),
    SampleCode varchar(4000),
    AR_base_64_coded varchar(max))
GO

COPY INTO [dbo].[kompa]
FROM 'https://dlsingraphic01.blob.core.windows.net/kompa/439-2023-01260156.txt'
WITH
(
    CREDENTIAL =(IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'),
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
    ROWTERMINATOR= '\n',
    FIRSTROW = 2
)

DROP TABLE [dbo].[survey]
CREATE TABLE dbo.survey(
    Year int,
    Industry_aggregation_NZSIOC char(10),
    Industry_code_NZSIOC  char(10),
    Industry_name_NZSIOC  char(100),
    Units  char(100),
    Variable_code  char(10),
    Variable_name  char(100),
    Variable_category  char(100),
    Value  char(100),
    Industry_code_ANZSIC06  varchar(500))
GO

COPY INTO [dbo].[survey]
FROM 'https://dlsingraphic01.blob.core.windows.net/kompa/annual-enterprise-survey-2021-financial-year-provisional-csv.csv'
WITH
(
    CREDENTIAL =(IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'),
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
    ROWTERMINATOR= '\n',
    FIRSTROW = 2
)
